 2010-00602010-01-14,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of GARY POLONSKY of Courtice, Ontario, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
